Intro.Title: Hello, I'm Johans.
Intro.Text: I'm a full-stack developer with +5 years of experience. I enjoy building sites & apps. My focus is in JS/TS world.

About.Title: About me
About.Bio1: I am a dedicated code enthusiast and a passionate programmer, deeply committed to upholding the principles of best practices and clean code architecture.
About.Bio2: Beyond the realm of code and projects, I am ceaselessly driven by an insatiable thirst for personal and professional growth. Each day presents an opportunity to surpass yesterday's version of myself, as I tirelessly strive for self-improvement. This journey embodies my enduring commitment to mastery in both personal and professional aspects.
About.Bio3: My reverence for programming goes beyond its utilitarian function; it is a medium through which I stimulate my intellect, conquer challenges, and foster creativity. This profession is not just a livelihood; it is a lifelong commitment that continually nurtures my mind through problem-solving and dynamic challenges.
About.Bio4: Join me as we explore the intricate symphony of code, creativity, and unwavering growth. Let's collaboratively transform challenges into triumphs and lines of code into exceptional solutions.

Projects.Title: My Projects
Projects.Revius: Lets users create and edit reviews about certain products on the internet, it also has the data of the reviews from other retailers websites. (Still in development)
Projects.Taskify: Todo List App, in there you can add, edit, delete, and complete tasks. It also lets you drag and drop your tasks to reorder or complete them.
Projects.Mochilas Mineras: Landing page for Mochilas Mineras. It is a business mark in Chile. It has business info, a contact form and a list of products.
Projects.Tic Tac Toe Game: Simple Tic Tac Toe Game made using react, it has the ability to calculate the winner and restart the game

Graduated Computer Science.Title: Graduado de Ingeniería en Informática
Graduated Computer Science.Description: I graduated after 4 years of studying. I immediately found a job as a web developer.

Freelance Web Developer.Title: Freelance Web Developer
Freelance Web Developer.Description: I worked as a freelance web developer for about 3 years where I made a couple of web pages and sites, landing pages, and a user maintainer for a private server of Lineage 2 game. I also upskilled to the full stack.

Full-Stack Developer.Title: Full-Stack Developer
Full-Stack Developer.Description: I'm now a full-stack developer working at Evalueserve Chile. My stack includes React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, Prisma and MongoDB.

Contact.Title: Contact me
Contact.Subtitle: Please contact me directly at johansneirap@gmail.com or through this form.
